Description.Name: Heat Sink Converter
Description.Details: Using open source 3333 hardware that we found on Appian, we can set up a production line to convert standard Heat Sinks to Thermo-Cyclic Heat Sinks. It'll convert one per day, allowing us to build up a stockpile.

AssignedCastDescription: Okay, what we got here is a setup that can be shoved in a corner of any decently sized base or ship, takes cheap raw materials, and turns regular old Heat Sinks into better Double Heat Sinks. And this was originally a cheap, budget solution to the problem of new Heat Sink tech making old stuff obsolete. A shame Quintiple Heat Sinks were expensive, because just imagine what we could do with a few of those.
